Prophets: Ishaq, Yaqub, Yusuf, Ayyub, Musa, Harun, Dawud, Sulayman, Ilyas, Al-Yasa, Yunus, Zakariya, Yahya, Isa
Adam, Idris, Nuh, Hud, Salih, Ibrahim, Lut, Ismail, Ishaq, Yaqub, Yusuf, Ayyub, Shu'ayb, Musa, Harun, Dawud, Sulayman, Ilyas, Al-Yasa, Yunus, Zakariya, Yahya, Isa, Muhammad

Category: Umm al muminin (Mothers of the Believers)
Prophets: Khadijah bint Khuwaylid, Sawdah bint Zamah, Aisha bint Abu Bakr, Hafsa bint Umar, Zaynab bint Khuzaymah, Umm Salamah (Hind bint Abi Umayyah), Zaynab bint Jahsh, Juwariya bint al-Harith, Umm Habibah (Ramlah bint Abu Sufyan, Saffiyah bint Huyayy, Maymunah bint al-Harith)
